text: gece vakti, el çadırına baskın verip şehzade kaçıracak
english: At night, he'll raid the tent and kidnap the prince.
I'm going to miss this feast too.
No way.
Just yesterday

text: gitsinler diye ağlayıp zırladığın insanların çadırına muhafız mı oldun?
english: You've been guarding the tent of the people you cried out to get them to leave?

text: Senin kafana göre biat toplayıp, bey olduğun obada
english: That's when you get your own beer, and you're a gentleman.

text: e bırak biz de muhafız oluverelim, emmi
english: So let us be the guards, ma'am.

text: Hem bu obanın bir muhafızı olmalı
english: Besides, this oban must have a guard.

text: Olmalı ki it, köpek kuyruğunu sallaya sallaya obada dolaşmasın
english: It's got to be a dog, so the dog doesn't have to walk around the room waving its tail around.
Sir, Ertugrul and the Alps are gone.
Round up the men you trust and they'll come after you.
Tell them.
And don't hesitate to shed blood if necessary.

text: Biz dere kenarından, siz de tepeden gidin!
english: We go down the creek, you go down the hill!
Turgut, go ahead.
Go ahead.
My prince, go ahead.
Yeah!

text: Hayme Ana, Ertuğrul böyle bir şey yapmaz
english: Hayme Ana, Ertugrul wouldn't do such a thing.

text: Bu haysiyetsiz, gemi azıya aldı iyice kızım
english: It's a disgrace, the ship's gone too far, my daughter.

text: Bu iftiralar, sahibinin kötü yüreğinin aynasıdır
english: These slanders are the mirror of the evil heart of your master.

english: It was the dawn that destroyed our men in the caravan raid.

Let's go, Mr. Kayi.
Solomon is a young man whom our Shah has not collected.
We don't have a place.
Tonight
I'm going to take Mother Hayme away from the tent.
The rest is up to you.

text: Süleyman Şah ölürse, ben babamın intikamını almış olacağım
english: If Solomon Shah dies, I will avenge my father's death.
You'll be Kayi's master
Why is it dark in here?
The Beneficent!
Why aren't these lamps lit, Rahman?
I don't know, sir.
If the Hour were to come, you would not know.
Sir!

text: Bir şeyler bulup şu yarığı kapat!
english: Find something and close that rift!
Yes, sir.

text: Burada olanlardan hiç kimsenin haberi olmayacak!
english: No one will ever know what happened here!

text: Babamın yanından bir an bile ayrılma!
english: Don't leave my father's side for a moment!
Yes, sir.
What's the status of the palace?

text: Hemen her mevkie bizden birilerini yerleştirmiş durumdayız
english: We've placed one of our own in almost every position.
What about Atabey?
You've done it!
He's always got his eyes on his niece.
But

english: El Aziz's Atabey, Shahabestin Tuğrul helped

I can't be the sultan of your heart

text: Selcan denen o kancığı doğduğuna pişman edeceğim Yiva
english: I'm gonna make that bitch Selcan regret being born, Yiva.

text: Bana yaptığı oyunun cezasını çok ağır ödeyecek
english: He's going to pay for what he did to me.
I'll be breathing down his neck like death

He walks like a fireball on the obada
Wherever he wants, there's a flame.
If my name is Kurdoglu

text: O iki canlı kancığın bir canını alacaksın Yiva
english: You're gonna take the life of those two living bitches, Yiva.
Before I could hold the child in her arms

text: bey soyuna torun verdim diye salınamadan
english: The gentleman couldn't be released because I gave his descendants grandchildren.

Get out of the way!
Blasphemy!
I brought you water, get up!
My father.
Did you kill Baybora?
Here you go, girl.
Good luck with that!

text: Allah'ın izniyle biz hazırız Gündoğdu Bey
english: With Allah's permission, we are ready, Mr. Gündüz.
What's the matter, sir?
It's what's clouding your heart.

text: canını sıkan bir şey mi var?
english: Is something bothering you?
It's dangerous. Crazy Iron.

text: Siz obadan yola çıkarken güvenilir Alpleri yanına veririm
english: I'll take the trusted Alps with you when you leave the Oba.
You're a good boy.
You're a gentleman.

text: elbet bana her şeyi söylemek zorunda değilsin
english: Of course you don't have to tell me everything.

text: Ama benim bilmem gereken bir şey varsa
english: But if there's something I need to know
You'll tell me, won't you, sir?

text: Her daim temkinli olmak iyidir derim beyim
english: I always say it's good to be cautious, sir.

text: Artık tepemizdeki buluta, esen rüzgâra bile güvenemez olduk
english: Now we can't trust the clouds above us, not even the wind blowing
You start making your own arrangements.
Don't say that, sir.

text: Benim gibi adamın hazırlığından ne olacak ki?
english: What's the point of a guy like me getting ready?
I just need to say goodbye to someone.

text: Vakit varken ben de onu aradan çıkarayım
english: I'll get him out of the way while there's time.
Hero!
Ah!
Ah!.. Yah!

That day
I
I'll cry in secret, in a dark corner
Because you're not there for me
You won't be able to wipe away my tears

text: Aykız, günü geldiğinde bana bir torun verecek
english: The moongirl will give me a grandchild when the day comes

text: Sen o bebenin yamru yumru ellerini tutamayacaksın
english: You're not gonna be able to hold that baby's crooked hands.
It's me.
He saw a war.
"My heart is filled with fear"
She'll be even more tired without you.
But no one
Come on, Iron Master.
Get up.

text: sen olmazsan bu obanın Alplerini kim pusatlandırır
english: If you're not here, who's gonna run the Alps out of this room?
He won't say.

text: Ama bu cihanın kendisi de geçici bir kışla değil mi Aybala'm?
english: But this jihad itself is a temporary barracks, isn't it, Aybala?

text: Günü gelip, vakit eriştiğinde ben de göç kervanıyla hakiki yurda kavuşacağım
english: When the day comes, when the time has come, I'll take the caravan to the real home.
We'll meet on that day.
That's enough to know, my Aybala.
In the blink of an eye
The woman I love with my heart

text: o zamana kadar sen bu soğuk toprağın altındayken
english: Until then, when you were in this cold ground,

text: ben harlı demir ocağının karşısında dahi üşüyor olacağım
english: I'll be cold in front of the hot forge.

text: Bunu bil istedim Allah'a emanet ol
english: I just wanted you to know that God bless you.
I'm sorry for your loss, son.

text: Dünya hali işte, iki kapılı han
english: It's a two-door inn.
Thank you, Master Iron.
Earth Innkeeper, we're passengers.

text: Yiyecek lokması, alacak nefesi biten giriyor kara toprağın altına
english: Food bites, breaths running out, going under the black earth.
You're right, Bozok.
May Allah increase your patience.
Peace be with you.
Peace out, Iron Master.
Godspeed.
Hero!
Don't come any closer!
Drop the axe, I'll cut the kid's throat!
Uah!
Tie him up!
Ho!
We need to speed up, my prince.

text: At üstünde sarsıldıkça kanaması artıyor, Ertuğrul
english: The more he shakes on the horse, the more he bleeds, Ertugrul
Let's stop over there.
Ugh!
Ertugrulus
You got 'em.
Don't you think?
Sir, Ertuğrullar
Did you lose them?
Sir, have mercy
Ah!
Gökçe!

text: Şu merhemleri kolay bir yere koy kızım, yolda oyalamasın elimizi
english: Put those ointments in an easy place, girl, and don't let them distract us on the way.
Okay.
Selcan, don't take it so hard, girl.
God forbid you're in pain.

text: Bak ben ne düşündüm biliyor musun?
english: You know what I was thinking?

text: Senin bu gebe halinle kervana kalman hiç doğru değil
english: It's not right for you to be stuck in the caravan with your pregnancy.
Continue the migration with us, huh?
Thank you, Mother.
I don't know. What would Gündüz say?
I don't think he'd mind.
You're right, it's a brain. Ask it.

text: Siz de şu silahlığı alın hele
english: Why don't you take the gun?
My sunup!

text: Hayme Ana der ki gözüm arkada kalmasın, sen de bizimle gel
english: Hayme Ana says I don't want to lose sight of you, so come with us.
After last night, he'd be worried.
What's up?

text: Dün gece ne olmuş da endişelenirmiş?
english: What about last night?
I'm in pain!

text: Kervanda yorulurum, bebemin başına bir şey gelir diye düşünürmüş
english: I'd get tired in the caravan, and she'd think something would happen to my baby.
You're staying here, too.

text: Dün geceden sonra ben de endişelenirim
english: After last night, I'll worry too.
I always want you in front of me.

text: Oğlun için endişelenirsin demek Yanında olalım istersin
english: You'd be worried about your son. You'd want us to be there for you.
Whatever you say, it's daylight.
Sir, we intended to stop the migration We couldn't do it
We thought we'd take care of Solomon Shah.
No.

text: Karnında durmasın lafların Tamamını söyle de rahatla Alpargu
english: Don't let it stand in your belly Say all the words and relax Alpargu

text: Sabah kudurmuş eniği saldın Süleyman Şah'ın üzerine
english: In the morning, you released the rabid puppy upon the king of Solomon.
Now we're going to see him off.

text: Senin işlerine pek akıl sır erdiremedim beyim
english: I don't understand much about your work, sir.

text: Eğer benim aklım sadece bir adım ötesini görseydi
english: If my mind could only see one step ahead

text: benim adım da Alpargu olurdu aslanım
english: My name would be Alpargu, my lion.
Before I put the arrow on the bow beam

text: düşeceği menzili anladığım için bana Kurdoğlu dediler
english: They called me Kurdoglu because I understood the range he was going to fall from.
What's up, sis?
What's up, brother? What's up?
It's a good thing you're on the road with Hayme Ana.

text: Ancak bu uzun yolu, doğru sonuçlandırmayı bilirsen
english: But if you know how to make this long road work

text: Süleyman Şah hastalandığından beri başından ayrılmazsın
english: Ever since Solomon Shah got sick, you've been stuck in his head.

text: Yol boyunca da aynı mahareti gösterecek Hayme Ana'nın eli ayağı olacaksın
english: You'll be Mother Hayme's hand and foot to show the same skill along the way.
Of course it's my sister.
My naive brother.

text: Hayme Ana'nın gözüne öyle bir gireceksin ki
english: You're gonna be so in Hayme's eye.
You're the only daughter-in-law who can't dream.

text: Ertuğrul'la evleneceğini hatırlatacaksın ki söylediği laftan cayamasın
english: You will remind him that he will marry Ertugrul so that he will not break his promise.
What about Ertugrul?

text: O kızda gönlü olduğunu Hayme Ana bilmez mi?
english: Doesn't Hayme Ana know you have a crush on her?

text: Laf ağızdan bir kere çıkar Gökçe
english: Come out of the mouth once, Gökçe

text: Senin gibi masum, iyi yürekli bir kızın gururuyla oynamak
english: Playing with the pride of an innocent, kind girl like you
It's not like Mother Hayme to break her dreams.

text: Eğer o bunu unuttuysa, sen hatırlatacaksın
english: If he's forgotten it, you'll remember it.
Sister

text: hasta yatağına düştüğünden beri beyimizin niye başından hiç ayrılmam bilir misin?
english: Do you know why I've never left our master's side since he fell into his sick bed?
You said it yourself.
Ertugrul won't break his father's word

text: Süleyman Şah, "Siz evleneceksiniz." dedikten sonra biter bu iş diye
english: When Solomon said, "You will get married," he said, "It will be over."
That's why

text: Hep dua ederim Süleyman Şah bir an önce ayağa kalksın
english: I always pray that the king of Solomon will rise at once
Rise, and may God have mercy!
Instead of such a blessing

text: Hayme Ana, Ertuğrul'un karşısında dimdik dursun diye dua et
english: Mother Hayme, pray that she stand tall before Ertuğrul.

text: Gökçe gelinim olacak diye ısrar etsin diye
english: So she can insist that I have a daughter-in-law.
Give it your best shot.
May he find a cure in the land you've gone to

text: Şifa bulasın da yeni yurdunda obanı dimdik ayakta karşılayasın
english: Heal him so that you can welcome him to his new home.

Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on.
Give me your blessing, mother.
Way to go, son.

text: Babam önce Allah'a, sonra sana emanet
english: My father is in the hands of God, then you.
We don't know our friends, we don't know our enemies.
The roads are always coming out. Be careful.
And you'll tell me.
Take care of your wife and child.

text: Bir obada dirlik ve birlik yoksa göç daha da zordur
english: It's even harder to emigrate when there's no unity and unity in an oba.

text: İşin çok zor evladım Allah yardımcın olsun
english: Your job is very difficult, my son. May God help you.

text: Sağ ol ana. Sen hiç merak etme
english: Thank you, Mother, don't worry about a thing.

text: Bebesinden keçisine her bir can burada bana emanet
english: I'll take care of every life from baby to goat.
May we get to Aleppo safely.
Inshallah.
Come on, Alps.

text: Su gibi gidin ana. Siz yol aldıkça dertler ardınızda kalsın
english: Go like water, Mother, and as long as you're on your way, let your troubles be behind you.

text: Yeni yurtta düğünler yapmak, torunlarınızı kucağınıza almak nasip olsun inşallah
english: May it be possible to have weddings in a new dorm, to hold your grandchildren.
God willing, my daughter, God willing.

text: İnşallah kan kardeşimin sıhhate kavuştuğunu duymak nasip olur
english: Let's hope my brother gets his blood back.

text: Allah yol selameti versin Hayme Hatun
english: God bless you, Hayme Hatun.
Good-bye, Mother Hayme.
You have the Alps with you, God willing.

text: Ama siz yine de kendinizi kollayın
english: But you still have to look out for yourself.
You know, the enemy is everywhere.
Don't worry about us Kurdoglu
Remember, Rahman, you learned last night.
A snake doesn't use a door.
Ho!
How is he, my prince?

text: Bir inip baksak iyi olur Ertuğrul
english: We'd better go down and have a look, Ertugrul.
Press it from the inside.
Press

text: Burada daha fazla kalmayalım Tehlikeli olabilir
english: Let's not stay here any longer. It could be dangerous.

text: Bir an evvel yola çıkalım Halep'te bakarız hal çaresine
english: Let's get out of here. We'll take care of it in Aleppo.
Okay.
Can you take it, Halima?
I'll take it, Mr. Ertugrul.
For the sake of his innocence, forgive my daughter.

text: Senin rahmet kapın her zaman açıktır
english: Your mercy is always open
Indeed, You are the All-forgiving, the All-merciful.
You're a sight for sore eyes.
You are the mightiest of avengers
Destroy the wrong-doers.
I'm not the cruel one.
You know that.
You killed Elenora.

text: Beni kırk defa diriltip tekrar öldürsen bile
english: Even if you resurrect me 40 times and kill me again
You still won't get what you want from me.
You were like that when you were a kid.
Persistence makes you very unpleasant.

text: Ama ben o inadının nasıl kırılacağını çok iyi biliyorum
english: But I know exactly how to break his stubbornness.
I'm old now, Mark.
Really, the one we met in Aleppo yesterday.
Ibn Al-Arabi Muhiddin.

text: Seni kırk defa öldüreceğime onu bir defa öldürsem
english: I'd rather kill him once than kill you 40 times.
Will you be stubborn?
We both know you can't kill him.
You're right.

text: Çocukken de böyle hem inatçı hem de zekiydin
english: When you were a kid, you were stubborn and smart.
To get that crate.
I need you both alive.

text: Ama bu demek değildir ki o bedeviyi tutup
english: But that doesn't mean you can grab that Bedouin
I can't put him in that dungeon across the street.

text: Onun günbegün çürüdüğünü görmeye dayanabilecek misin?
english: Can you bear to see him rot every day?

Peace be upon you, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet, my sweet.

Good Lord Salli al-Seyedina Muhammad's
Good luck, Moongirl.
Thank you.
How's the gentleman?
It'll get better, God willing.
Your dowry?

text: Yeni obanın ilk düğünü sizinki olacak
english: Yours will be the first wedding of the new Oba.
And secondly, I hope Ertugrul and I will.
Gökçe
I know you're in love with Ertugrul

text: Ama sen de biliyorsun; o seni bacısı gibi görür
english: But you know she thinks of you as a sister.
You're dreaming on your own. You believe it.
Then you'll be sorry.
You're wrong, Moongirl.

text: Kendi kendime gelin güvey olduğum yok
english: I'm not a bride and groom to myself.
Solomon told my Shah to Ertuğrul

text: Hele bir göç bitsin düğününüzü yapacağım dedi
english: Once the migration was over, he said he'd have your wedding.
Let's get ready, we're on our way.

text: Ertuğrul bunu kabul eder mi sanıyorsun?
english: Do you think Ertugrul would agree to this?
His heart is in Halima.

text: Bunu görmemek, bilmemek için kör olmak gerek
english: You have to be blind not to see it, not to know it.

text: Sen yine de kendinden bu kadar emin olma
english: Don't be so sure of yourself, though.

text: Malum, bu işler kader kısmet bacım
english: You know, it's fate, sister.
Of course it is.

text: Dünyanın bin bir türlü hali var
english: The world has its ways

text: Bak, sen de Turgut'la çocukluğundan beri sevdalısınız
english: Look, you've been in love with Turgut since he was a kid.

Or I'll feed his carcass to the dogs.

text: Zaten hiç kimse onun burada olduğunu bilmiyordu ki

text: Muhafızlar bile kimi koruduklarının farkında değil

text: Ağzından tek bir laf bile alamadım

No one's supposed to see this body.

text: Onun ölmesine her kim yardım ettiyse

Sir, if I may.

I don't know how I can repay you

text: şimdi de benim için hayatını tehlikeye atıyorsun

text: Hakk'ın yolunda vazifesi için her türlü fedakarlığı yapan

text: Yeğeninin fedakârlığı bir işe yaradı mı?

text: Ve bu tercihinin bedelini de ödüyor

text: Petruccio, Petruccio, sadece ihanet edenler değil

english: But deep in the woods, when you meet two or three lions, you're looking for a hole to escape.

I've got some business in town.
When I get back, I'll take my trust back from you.
Take care of this young man while I'm gone.

english: He's only dead to El Aziz now.

text: Bütün Halep Şahabettin'i Haçlılarla iş birliği yapan bir hain olarak hatırlayacak
english: He will remember all Aleppo Shahabatin as a traitor who collaborated with the Crusaders.

text: Ben de bu büyük ihaneti ortaya çıkarıp
english: And I will reveal this great betrayal.

text: Emir Hazretlerinin sarayda güvendiği tek adam olacağım
english: I'll be the only man His Majesty trusts in the palace.
What about Ertugrul?
I mean, the Apricots?

text: Yurt meselesi. Bugün hallolacak değil mi?
english: It'll be done today, won't it?
Don't worry about it.

text: El Aziz artık benim parmaklarımın ucunda oynattığım bir kukladan ibaret
english: El Aziz is now just a puppet that I've got on my toes.

text: Ertuğrul bugün o saraydan her şeyini kaybetmiş bir adam olarak çıkacak
english: Ertuğrul will leave the palace today as a man who has lost everything.
No, man!
You're wrong!

text: Ertuğrul esas kaybettiği şeyin ne olduğunu bizimle karşılaştığında anlayacak
english: Ertugrul will know what he's really lost when he meets us.
God is All-merciful, All-compassionate.
Ertugrul!
O Allah!
Ertugrul, look out!
Ertugrul, look out!
Thank God you're better.
Dad!
Father, where's Hero?

text: Baba, Yiğit'e bir şey mi oldu? Kardeşim nerede?
english: Father, has something happened to Hero?

text: Hayır, hayır, hayır kızım hayır, kardeşine bir şey olmadı
english: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,
Along with the Alps
Take it easy. You're gonna bleed, girl.
Where are we, Dad?
We've arrived in Aleppo, my daughter.
We're in a safe place.
Father, why isn't Hero with us?
I want to see my brother.
You'll see your brother tomorrow, girl.
Go to sleep. Go to sleep.
Sleep so you can rest
Lord, have mercy on these innocents.

text: Yiğit'imi de sağ salim bize kavuştur
english: And bring my hero back to us safe and sound.
The maid was right.

text: Bu adam gerçekten zehirlenmiş Emir Hazretleri
english: This man is indeed poisoned, Your Highness.
White husband.
What kind of disease is this plague?

text: Bu beladan kurtulmak için onca hayvanı telef etmedik mi?
english: Didn't we kill all those animals to get out of this mess?
We did, sir.
And that he did.

text: çocuk aklı işte. Kıyamamış kuzusuna, saklamış
english: The child's mind, he hid it in his unfathomable lamb.
Oh, dear!
Tomorrow the migration begins.
What will happen to these wretches?

text: Beyim, onlar için yapabileceğimiz pek bir şey kalmadı
english: Sir, there's not much we can do for them.
It won't be more than three or five days.
We're just gonna leave it behind?
I'll stay with them.

text: Bey, elimden bir şey gelmez biliyorum
english: Sir, I know there's nothing I can do.
But I can ease their pain just a little bit.
White husband, there are some who don't want to emigrate.
I need to talk to them quickly.

text: Eğer burada kalırlarsa bir felaket olur
english: If they stay here, it'll be a disaster.

text: Ne olursa olsun bunu bilmeleri icap eder
english: No matter what happens, they need to know.
Let's make it easy for God.
Your Highness!

text: Yeni yurt için Kayı obasının şükranlarını babam Süleyman Şah'ın selamını getirdim
english: I bring thanks to the Kayı Oba for the new home, the salutation of my father, Süleyman Shah.
I've heard rumors about your height.

text: Bunlar hakkında bir şey diyecek misin Ertuğrul?
english: Do you have anything to say about these, Ertugrul?
We also spoke with your patriarch, Shahabettin Tuğrul.
These rumors are all lies.

text: Aramızdaki ittifakı tehlikeli gören Tapınakçılar obamıza saldırdılar
english: The Templars who considered our alliance dangerous attacked our oba.
With people trying to infect our Oba.
It's the same people who spread this rumor.
You're lying, Ertugrul!

text: Sınırınızın ötesinde sandığınız düşmanlar, sarayınızın içinde
english: The enemies you think are beyond your borders, are inside your palace.
You're not aware.
Your Highness!

text: Senin ne işin var burada Nasır?
english: What are you doing here, Nasser?
Where is His Highness?
Guards!
How dare you!
Alert El Aziz immediately.
Calm down, Abbess.

text: Bu zaten Emir Hazretlerinin kendi talimatı
english: That's already His Majesty's own instructions.
He wants to question you personally.
No Kurdoglu?
I don't know where he is, sir.

text: Bana eşyalarını toplatıp kervana yetiştirmemi söyledi
english: He told me to pack his things and get him to the caravan.

text: Kendisi önemli bir meseleyi halledip kervana öyle katılacakmış
english: He said he'd take care of something important and join the caravan.
Join the caravan?

text: Demek Kurdoğlu Beyimiz de bizimle birlikte göçer
english: So Mr. Kurdoğlu will leave with us.

text: Alpargu, de hele, beyin senden habersiz iş görmez
english: Alpargu, say, the brain doesn't work without you knowing.
I don't know, sir.
Alone
Solomon said it had something to do with the Shah.
He didn't say the rest.

text: Araba da iyice sarstı beyimizi Hayme Ana
english: And the car shook our gentleman Hayme Ana
That's right, Master Iron.
I'm glad we stopped here.
Besides, animals get a little breather.
God bless you for your health.
Standing up in Aleppo.
Inshallah.
Hayme!
Sir!
Sir!
Ah!
Sir!

text: Hadi kızım, biraz açılın da beyimiz hava alsın
english: Come on, girl, give the gentleman some air.
Bozok!
Tell me!
Why isn't the order coming?

text: Melik Hazretleri neden böyle davranıyor inanın bilmiyorum Atabeyim
english: I don't know why His Highness is acting like this.

text: Kendisine her ne kadar ısrar etmiş olsam da görüşmeyi istemedi
english: As much as I insisted on seeing him, he didn't want to see me.
Only he gave you this guarantee.

text: Kesinlikle adil bir yargılanmaya tabii tutulacaksınız
english: You will be subject to a fair trial.

text: Ve adaletle yargılanmanızdan bizzat sorumlu olacağım
english: And I will personally be responsible for your justice.
You can go, Nasser.
Oh, my God.
But don't let justice get hurt
Don't give the oppressors a chance
If the tyrant kills me, let him kill me.

text: Ama senin adını yüceltecek nizam ebediyen sürsün Allah'ım
english: But may the order that will glorify your name last forever, my God.
He's a Turkmen man!
Mr. Ertugrul!
If you look, you won't regret it.

text: Efendi Titus sana der ki "Kartal kafeste."
english: Lord Titus tells you, "The Eagle is in the cage."
"The wolf's next."
